text: Palm Harbor home with great views of Summerhaven, located on the outskirts of the highly desired Loma Sabino Pines. 3 bedrooms and 2 3/4 bathrooms. Large heated room below with lots of potential to be a game room/workshop or extra bedroom. Open floor plan with split bedrooms. Large wrap around trex deck to enjoy the nice mountain weather. Laundry room entry leads into large open kitchen, dining area and cozy living room. Plenty of storage space throughout. Don't miss put on this gem of a cabin!
formatted_address: 12990 N Yuma Ave, Mount Lemmon, AZ, 85619

text: Charming large cabin located on Mount Lemmon has year round access to enjoy all the seasons! This 2,378 sqft 4 bedroom 3 bath cabin being sold furnished, sits on a 5,193 sqft lot. Inside features beautiful cherry wood floors, travertine ceramic and slate tile and tongue and groove walls and ceilings. Large mud room with a washer, dryer and trash compactor. Great for storing all your hiking boots and ski gear! Gourmet kitchen with stainless steel appliances and beautiful granite counter tops. Cozy fireplace in the spacious great room to keep you warm in the winter months. Bedroom on main floor with its own private deck to enjoy the early morning views. 3/4 bath on main floor with a walk-in in shower with a built in bench and beautiful granite counter tops. Upstairs has 2 bedrooms that have their own private decks as well and 3/4 bathroom with a walk in shower. Downstairs basement leads to two rooms, one with a full bath and storage closet. The other has two storage closets and a large concrete patio to enjoy the lovely mountain views. This beautifully designed spacious cabin is a must see, don't miss out on your dream cabin!
formatted_address: 12967 N Tempe Ave, Mount Lemmon, AZ, 85619

text: Beautiful Forest service cabin with CITY VIEWS!! Two bedrooms with a full bath on the main floor, cute little loft area. Comfy fireplace area. Nice open kitchen. Downstairs has so much character! Jacuzzi room, play area with air hockey, washer/dryer bathroom. Two doors to the outside and sit outside under the covered porch. Top deck has BEAUTIFUL views of the city lights at night and perfect spot to watch the stars. Cabin has a wrought iron door for security. Quite area
formatted_address: 9865 N Willow Loop, Mount Lemmon, AZ, 85619

text: The Cubist -- designed by award-winning architect Kevin B. Howard -- takes Mt. Lemmon and Summerhaven real estate to the next level and beyond. This architectural masterpiece showcases uncompromising design, exceptional quality, and the finest finishes, appliances, and fixtures.Perfectly positioned to capture spectacular Mt. Lemmon and lush forest views, this three-story modern ''Glass Treehouse'' redefines the standard for a summer retreat in Southern Arizona. Every detail reflects a commitment to luxury, innovation, and harmony with the natural surroundings. Located in the heart of Summerhaven, this remarkable property is easy to preview, with the exclusive opportunity to meet directly with the architect/builder to fully appreciate the vision and craftsmanship of this one-of-a-kind home
formatted_address: 12625 N Ray Ave, Mount Lemmon, AZ, 85619

text: GREAT VIEWS!! Escape from the heat to this stunning turn key, fully furnished cabin on Mt. Lemmon. Handcrafted log cabin from Colorado with 4,939 sqft of living space. Cabin sits on a large lot, 17,461 sqft. Year round access to enjoy all year long! Open Kitchen/great room with unobstructed panoramic views of Summerhaven, the perfect cabin for hosting. Luxurious kitchen includes large island with breakfast bar that seats 6. Stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Dining area and living area right off kitchen with a beautiful stone fireplace to keep you cozy in the winter months. Large wrap around trex deck with plenty of ample space for outdoor gatherings and enjoying beautiful Arizona sunsets and mountain views. New roof installed this year. Spacious master bedroom on main floor with 2 closets and 3/4 bathroom with a jetted tub and granite counter tops. Second bedroom on main floor that can be used as an office space/bedroom, and a 3/4 bathroom with a shower. Off kitchen is a mud/laundry room with a washer and drier, sink, fridge and storage. Upstairs includes a large loft area with lots of sleeping space and a large storage/kids play room. 2 more bedrooms and another 3/4 bath with shower. Finished basement downstairs entails a reading nook, work out space with equipment and a 1/2 bath. Built in bar, pool table, poker table and covered patio for endless entertainment. Cabin has a 2 car garage with workshop area with great storage space. Do not miss out on this rare gem of a cabin on Mt. Lemmon.
formatted_address: 12709 N Casa Grande Ave, Mount Lemmon, AZ, 85619

text: Cool mountain living at its finest! Stunning 2BR/2BA cabin custom built by award winning builder Al LeCocq. Soaring vaulted log beamed ceilings. Log siding and knotty pine siding on all interior walls and ceilings. Beautiful maple and hickory hardwood floors. Gourmet kitchen with hickory cabinetry, beautiful granite counters and SS appliances. Luxurious bathrooms with pedestal sinks. Spacious 340 sqft covered deck offering wonderful mountain views. Note the cabin with the split bedroom plan has a 2nd smaller kitchen perfect for guests, tenants, etc. The 150 +/- sqft loft (low ceiling) is not included in the square footage shown in MLS.
formatted_address: 12963 N Tempe Ave, Mount Lemmon, AZ, 85619

text: Your mountain hideway starts here! Escape to the mountains with this 5,000 sq ft parcel on Mount Lemmon, offering year-round access on a paved road. Summer brings cool breezes and endless outdoor adventure, while winter transforms the area into a snowy alpine retreat. Electric and water are conveniently located at the lot line, with space ready for a septic system and propane tank to complete your mountain hideaway. Build your dream cabin or retreat in this unique four-season setting where you can enjoy crisp summer mornings, cozy winter nights, and everything in between.
formatted_address: 12632 N Casa Grande Ave Unit 18, Mount Lemmon, AZ, 85619

text: Perched above the town of Summerhaven on a premium double lot on Mt. Lemmon, this exceptional cabin offers panoramic views & easy access for perfect year-round mountain living. Thoughtfully designed, this versatile custom-built home provides plenty of space & parking for everyone. On the first floor, currently a game & recreation room, a private efficiency suite with a full bath, an electric fireplace, a bar, & a kitchenette, as well as a spacious living & sleeping area, functions perfectly as guest quarters or a fifth bedroom. The upper two floors, accessible by elevator, offer 3 additional bedrooms, 2 separate loft spaces, and 2.5 baths. Each floor opens to a generous wraparound deck, creating seamless indoor-outdoor living.
formatted_address: 12925 N Phoenix Ave, Mount Lemmon, AZ, 85619

text: This special parcel of land, on Mt. Lemmon, is surrounded by mature trees and is located on a paved road, allowing for year-round access. It is situated in the heart of Summerhaven. text: Discover the perfect opportunity to create your own mountain getaway in the heart of Summerhaven on Mt. Lemmon. text: Gorgeous lot- and very buildable! Brand new septic. Excellent location, close to town and trails. Lot provides lots of shade and amazing views. Private, dead-end road. Utilities to lot line! Licensed survey available.

text: Gorgeous, quiet and secluded 21,600.4 square foot wilderness lot amidst a beautiful forest of Aspens and Ponderosa pines. With endless potential, and sitting at an elevation of 8025.63 feet with great exposure to morning sun, this lot commands amazing views of Summerhaven Village and of the San Pedro Valley below. Water, phone and electricity close to the lot. No gas, bottled propane required. No sewer or septic, septic required. Perc test performed and land perc's. Lot has had a site and topographical survey.

text: Very Close to Mt Lemmon Lodge and the Cookie Cabin. Year Round Access. Seller will consider Seller Carryback with low down payment . Great opportunity to build your Mount Lemmon getaway. text: Discover your mountain retreat on this incredible opportunity nestled in the heart of Mt. Lemmon. Surrounded by towering pines and crisp alpine air, this property offers a peaceful escape from the desert heat and the perfect setting for a custom mountain cabin. The seller has architectural plans available for a thoughtfully designed cabin, or bring your own vision and create a one-of-a-kind getaway tailored to your lifestyle. A survey was also performed with elevations measured, available upon request. With no septic currently installed, buyers have the flexibility to design their build-out from the ground up. Owning a property on Mt. Lemmon means the opportunity to enjoy four distinct seasons, cool summers, golden fall foliage, snowy winter adventures, and fresh spring blooms. Outdoor enthusiasts will love the proximity to hiking trails, skiing, rock climbing, and year-round recreation, all just an hour from Tucson. Whether you dream of cozy weekends by the fire or hosting friends for stargazing under the mountain skies, this property is your canvas for the Mt. Lemmon lifestyle.
formatted_address: 11149 E Carter Canyon Rd, Mount Lemmon, AZ, 85619

text: Nice buildable lot on 5,880 sqft. Great location on a paved road for year round access. Perfect opportunity to build your dream cabin. Utilities close to lot from neighboring cabins. Don't miss out!
formatted_address: 12856 N Ajo Ave Unit 11, Mount Lemmon, AZ, 85619

text: Discover a rare gem in the coveted Summerhaven community-an exceptional lot that epitomizes the perfect blend of seclusion and accessibility. Nestled in this sought-after enclave, this 15,681 square-foot opportunity to create your personal retreat. The community is alive with activity, featuring a charming ski hill, vibrant fall festivals, and the stunning beauty of changing seasons. Notably, this property offers year-round access via a paved road, ensuring convenience and ease of use throughout the year. Imagine waking up to breathtaking mountain views and the refreshing coolness in contrast to Tucson summer heat.
